channel.title: Can more ppl be on one server?
channel.description:
i want to play with my freind on a server but i dont kno how to invite him is there anyway i can get him to my server?
also when i trie to get some item like party hat it says
wrong syntax! use as ::pickup 099510

item.title: Can more ppl be on one server?
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

well to start off this should be in the moparscape questions section but anyways. just tell your friedn the server IP i suppose.simple as that lol unless i misunderstood what your asking. and the wrong syntax error thin is because you are putting in too big of a number i think. because 0995 is the code for gp. so type this in exactly like this ::pickup 0995 10000000
that should give you 10m. just do that till you have enough.or you might b able to ad a few 0â€™s. hope that helps

Read full topic
item.source: Can more ppl be on one server?
